00001 #import <Cocoa/Cocoa.h>
00002 
00003 @interface NSView (FocusRing)
00004 
00005 - (void)patchPreLeopardFocusRingDrawingForScrolling ;
00006 
00007 - (void)drawFocusRing ;
00008 // Although the above method invokes -lockFocus, and thus will work if
00009 // invoked while not within -drawRect, it is recommended to invoke this
00010 // method from within -drawRect, to avoid the possibility of a 
00011 // later invocation of -drawRect by Cocoa for some other purpose, which it
00012 // does frequently, will wipe out the focus ring that has just been drawn.
00013 // This can happen even before the focus ring has a chance to show!
00014         
00015 @end
